is the hybrid cloud storage problem that we have heard from talking to many customers you have lot of data already
from your traditional applications in your data centers in your remote offices
in your branch offices and that data is continuing to grow at a fair pace but
you also have data that's getting generated from new sources now new devices new instruments that wasn't the
case before so you have data that's continuing to pile up for which you need to provide storage to your end-users but
at the same time your budget is staying flat so you're looking at cloud and

one here is moving your backups to the cloud it could be backups of your on-premises
applications and databases to the cloud so think of cloud is not only the place

second one here is shifting on promise' storage to cloud backed file shares so if you have file based applications that

is around providing low latency access to data in Ihram dress for on-premises applications so a lot of customers have

SMB I Scaasi I scuzzy or VTL to make sure you don't have to change your

gateway manages that protocol translation for you Storage Gateway provides local caching
so you still have low latency access to your frequently used data so if your
applications are used to certain latency Storage Gateway provides that cache because it sits next to the application

uploads to the cloud storage gate also optimizes data transfer so if you have
